GSP33brsgor3u:18: yasmāt karmaṇā gatyāgatirūpo 'narthastasmāt karmaphale jugupsāṃ ghṛṇāṃ viraktiṃ kurvīteti pañcāgnividyopasaṃhāre śravaṇādvairāgyārthaṃ pradarśyate ityanvayaḥ /

GSP33brsgor3u:120: vidyāstutyarthamannatvaṃ na mukhyamityatra śrutyantarārthaṃ sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe-tathāhīti /

GSP33brsgor3u:140: tat tatrāvarohatāṃ jīvānāṃ madhye ye kecidiha karmabhūmau ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ puṇyayonibhāja iti yat tat abhyāśo ha avaśyaṃ hītyarthaḥ /

GSP33brsgor3u:294: avaroha eva tṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ śrutyuktamityata āha-avarohasyeti /

GSP33brsgor3u:325: udakaṃ bhittvā jāyate yūkādi jaṅgamamiti bhedaḥ /

GSP33brsgor3u:334: ākāśasādṛśyānantaraṃ piṇḍīkṛtā atisūkṣmaliṅgopahitāḥ vāyunetastataśca nīyamānā vāyusamā bhavanti /
GSP33brsgor3u:335: so 'nuśayī saṃgho vāyusamo bhūtvā dhūmasaṃgatastatsamo bhavati,

GSP33brsgor3u:340_1: tu dugdhaṃ dadhi bhavatītyādiprayoge bhavatiśrutervikārasvarūpāpattau mukhyatvāt
GSP33brsgor3u:343: samāno bhāvo dharmo yasya tadbhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sāmyamiti sūtrapadārthaḥ /

GSP33brsgor3u:357: siddhānte tu vrīhīyavādibhāvādanuśayināṃ vilambena nirgamanamiti viśeṣādākāśādibhāvācchīghraṃ nirgama ityavilambena yonyāpattirityanusaṃdhānādvairāgyadārḍhyamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:358: nanvākāśādiṣvanuśayināṃ sukhaṃ vrīhiyavādiṣu duḥkhamiti duḥśabdādbhāti na cirāciranirgamanamityata āha-sukhaduḥkhatāviśeṣaścāyamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:366: iha bhūmau varṣadhārādvārā patitāste 'nuśayino vrīhyādisāmyena jāyanta iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:367: atra jāyanta iti śruteḥ pūrvatrākāśādivarṣāntasādṛśyokteśca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor3u:372: siddhānte vrīhyādisaṃśleṣamātraṃ parihartuṃ yatnalāghavaṃ vairāgyadārḍhyaṃ ceti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:373: nanu dehotpattyā jīvānāṃ janma syānna svataḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:380: kratvarthahiṃsāderapi hiṃsātvādisāmānyena pravṛtterna hiṃsyādityādiśāstraniṣiddhatvākāreṇa duritāpūrvakāritvamaviruddhamiti sāṅkhyā āhuḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:381: śruto 'tra vrīhyādibhāvo 'nuśayināṃ na janyarūpaḥ karmaviśeṣaparāmarśaṃ vinātroktatvāt,

GSP33brsgor3u:384_0: apica 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ striyāṃ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati'iti vākyaśeṣe

GSP33brsgor3u:394: vaidikaṃ karmāśuddhaṃ na bhavati śāstravihitatvāditi sūtrārthaṃ prapañcayati-ayaṃ dharma ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:395_0: śucau deśe prātaḥ sāyaṅkāle jīvanādinimitte kṛtamagnihotraṃ dharmo bhavati sa evāśucideśe
GSP33brsgor3u:395_1: madhyarātre maraṇādinimitte kṛtaḥ sannadharmo bhavatīti nirṇayaḥ śāstraikasādhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:397: nanu yā hiṃsā so 'dharma ityutsargasya viśeṣavidhinā bādho 'tra na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:400: ayamarthaḥ-kāmye karmaṇi sarvatra karaṇāṃśe rāgataḥ pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:402: tathāca śyenākhye karmaṇi niṣedhe 'pi rāgaprābalyāt pravṛttiḥ syāt kratvaṅgahiṃsādau tu vidhita eva pravṛttirvācyā /
GSP33brsgor3u:403: sa ca vidhiryadyutsargaprāptamanarthahetutvaṃ na bādheta tarhi pravartako na syāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:408: pratirūpaṃ duḥkharūpaṃ tasya phalaṃ neti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor3u:415: tatrānnasthānuśayino retaḥ sekakartṛtvāyogādyogamātraṃ vācyaṃ tadvadupakrame 'pi yoga evāstheyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:422: evaṃ karmiṇāṃ gatyāgatisaṃsāro durvāra ityanusandhānāt karmaphalādvairāgyaṃ tattvajñānasādhanaṃ siddhamiti pādārthamupasaṃharati-iti siddhamiti //27//
GSP33brsgor3u:424: iti śrīmadparamahaṃsaparivrājakācārya śrīmadgovindabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brsgor3u:432: uktavairāgyasādhyastattvaṃpadārthaviveko vākyārthajñānasādhanamasmin pāde nirūpyata iti pādayorhetusādhyabhāvasaṃgatimāha-atikrānta iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:434: asmin pāde 'na sthānato 'pi'ityataḥ prāguddeśyatvena prathamaṃ jijñāsitatvaṃpadārtho 'vasthādvārā vivicyate,
GSP33brsgor3u:436_0: tatra pūrvaṃ gatyāgaticintayā jāgradavasthā nirūpitā tadanantarabhāvinīṃ svapnāvasthāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:436_1: śrutyuktāṃ viṣayīkṛtya tatra svapne rathādisṛṣṭyuktestadabhāvokteśca saṃśayaṃ vadan
GSP33brsgor3u:437: svapnarathādayo jāgradrathādivat vyāvahārikasattākā uta śuktirajatavat prātītikā iti saṃśayārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:441: mumūrṣoḥ sarvendriyopasaṃhārādetallokānanubhavo sati vāsanāmātreṇa imaṃ lokaṃ smarataḥ karmabalādhṛdaye manasā paralokasphūrtirūpaḥ svapno bhavati,
GSP33brsgor3u:443: tathāca śrutiḥ-'tasmin saṃdhye sthāne tiṣṭhannete ubhe sthāne paśyati idaṃ ca paralokasthānaṃ ca'iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:444: ayaṃ svapnaḥ kādācitka ityarucyā nityasvapnasya prabodhasaṃprasādasaṃdhibhavatvamuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:446_0: daivacakṣurādyajanyatadvattvaṃ martyalokalakṣaṇaṃ ca svapne 'stīti lakṣaṇato lokadvayasparśitvāt
GSP33brsgor3u:447: na kevalaṃ śrutyā svapnārthānāṃ vyāvahārikasatyatvaṃ kintu sakartṛkatvādapītyāha-sa hi karteti //1//
GSP33brsgor3u:456: yaḥ supteṣu nirvyāpāreṣu karaṇeṣu jāgarti tadeva śukraṃ svaprakāśaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:463: svapnarathādayaḥ prātītikā jāgradrathādau kḷptasāmagrīṃ vinā dṛṣṭatvācchuktirūpyādivaditi siddhāntayati-tuśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:464_0: cinmātraniṣṭhāvidyā cittvāvacchedena jīve 'pi sthitā rathādyākārā māyeti sūtrabhāṣyayoruktā
GSP33brsgor3u:464_1: māyāvidyayorabhedajñāpanāya mātrapadena tu sati pramātaryabādhyatvarūpasya vyāvahārikasatyatvasya nirāsa uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:474: yatra kāle svapnyayā vṛttyā carati tathā svaśarīre yatheṣṭaṃ caratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:476: kulāyāddehāt bahirivāmṛta ātmā caritvā yatra kāmaṃ yatheṣṭamīyate viharatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:479: evaṃ sati śrutiyuktibhyāṃ antareva svapne satītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:481: atra rātrisamaye 'pi ketumālādivarṣāntare vāsaro bhavati iti bhārata ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:486: sūcakaśca hi śruter ācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ / BBs_3,2.4 /
GSP33brsgor3u:487: svapnasya bhrāntimātratve tatsūcito 'pyarthaḥ satyo na syāditi śaṅkottaratvena sūtrāntaraṃ vyācaṣṭe-māyetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:488: mantreṇa devatānugraheṇauṣadhisevayā vā svapnaḥ satyasūcakāścet satyāḥ syurityata āha-tatrāpi bhavatu nāmeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:490_0: yathā kṛṣidvārā lāṅgalasya gavādijīvananimittatvaṃ tathā svapnabhokturadṛṣṭadvārā
GSP33brsgor3u:490_1: svapnasṛṣṭinimittatvaṃ na tu kumbhaṃ prati kumbhakārasyeva sākṣād svapnakartṛtvaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:491: tathāca svapnasya sakartṛkatvaṃ mukhyaṃ nāstīti hetvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:499: dvitīyasūtroktaprājñakartṛkatvaheturapi svapnasya kiṃ śrutisiddha uta prājñasya sarveśvaratvāt siddhaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:503: svena bhāsā svīyabuddhivṛttyā svena jyotiṣā svarūpacaitanyena ca svapnamanubhavatītyarthathaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:504: na kevalaṃ bṛhadāraṇyake jīvasya svapnakartṛtvaṃ śrutaṃ kintu kāṭhake 'pītyāha-ihāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:506: evaṃ hetoḥ śrutisiddhatvaṃ nirasya dvitīyamaṅgīkaroti-na cāsmābhiriti /
GSP33brsgor3u:507: tarhi hetusiddheḥ svapnasya satyatvamityāśaṅkya satyatvaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ veti vikalpya vyavahārakāle bādhadarśanāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:510: kastarhi svapnasya jāgrato viśeṣo 'tra kathyata ityāśaṅkya prātibhāsikatvamityāha-prāgiti //4//
GSP33brsgor3u:514: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau / BBs_3,2.5 /
GSP33brsgor3u:515: pūrvaṃ kḷptasāmagryabhāvāt svapno māyetyuktamayuktaṃ satyasaṅkalpamātreṇāpi satyasṛṣṭisaṃbhavāditi śaṅkāṃ kṛtvā pariharan sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-athapi syādityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:516: satyasaṃkalpasya hi saṃkalpātsṛṣṭiḥ satyā bhavati jīvasya tvasatyasaṃkalpatvaṃ pratyakṣamiti parihārārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:518: nāstīti na kintvāvṛtamasti tatpunarīśvaraprasādākasyacidvyajyata ityāha-na nāstīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:523_1: vā tṛtīyaṃ viśvaiśvaryamaṇimādirūpaṃ martyadehapāte sati siddhe dehe bhavati tadabhogānantaramātmajñānātkevalo
GSP33brsgor3u:538: tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchruter ātmani ca / BBs_3,2.7 /
GSP33brsgor3u:541: yatra kāle suptaḥ suṣuptaḥ samasto nirastabāhyakaraṇo manolayātsamyakprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:546: siddhānte nāḍībhiḥ purītataṃ gatvāntarhṛdi brahmaṇyeva śeta iti samuccyāt tannirṇaya iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:547: ekapuroḍāśārthatvaṃ vrīhiyavayordṛṣṭaṃ nāḍyādīnāmekasmin svāparūpārthe nirapekṣasthānatvaṃ tu kuta ityata āha-nāḍyādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:549: āyatanaśabdātsaptamyartha ādhāratvaṃ gamyata ityāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:550: anyatrāvasthādvaye śrānto jīvo viśrāntisthānaṃ prāṇākhyaṃ sadbrahmopasarpati suṣuptāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:551: saptamīśrutyā nirapekṣādhāratvabhānādvikalpa āstheyaḥ kadācitsamuccityāpi nāḍyādīnāṃ sthānatvamiti na samuccayaśrutivirodha iti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:554: yadā nāḍyaḥ suṣuptisthānaṃ tadā purītatsthānaṃ na bhavatīti śrutasthānatvasya pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:562: tathehāpi nāḍīpurītatorjīvasya saṃcāradvārā brahmaṇyeva suptiriti samuccaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:563: nāḍīnāṃ prāṇasya ca ekena vākyenopādānānmithaḥ samuccaya ityāha-ekavākyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:564: ādhāratvamātraṃ saptamyartho na nirapekṣatvamato na samuccayasya saptamyā bādha ityāha-na caivamapīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:566: atra nāḍīśrutau nāḍīṣu bhoktuḥ suptirna vivakṣitā raśmisaṃbandhanāḍīrūpamārgastutyarthatvādityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:570: 'tāsu tadā bhavatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śruteḥ samuccaya āśrito bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:572: ākāśe brahmaṇi śeta ityupakramya tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītamiti śeta ityuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:573: tathāca nāḍīdvārā purītataṃ gatvā brahmaṇi śeta iti samuccayaḥ siddha ityāha-tathā nāḍīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:574: satā saṃpanno bhavati prājñena saṃpariṣvakta iti satprājñayoḥ śruteḥ pañca suptisthānānītyata āha-satprājñayoriti /
GSP33brsgor3u:576: nāḍyādīnāṃ tu brahmanirapekṣatayā suṣuptajīvādhāratvāsāmarthyānna vikalpa ityāha-apica nāḍya iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:580: nanu brahmāpi jīvasya na mukhyaṃ sthānaṃ abhedādityata āha-brahmādhāratvamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:581: jīvasya brahmaṇyabhedenāvasthānaṃ nāḍīpurītatostu līnopādherjīvasya sthitireva na saṃbhavatītyekārthasāmarthyābhāvānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:582: suṣuptau jīvasya bhedakopādhilayāccautsargikabrahmābhedasya vikalpo na yukta ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:583: kiñca nāḍyādīnāmanyatamasthāne kvacitsuptivādināpi suṣuptaṃ na viśiṣyata iti vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:584: tacca vaktuṃ na śakyata ityāha-apica sthāneti /
GSP33brsgor3u:586: nāḍīpūritadratasya tu jīvasya bhedāvasthatvādbhedāvijñāne karaṇaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:591: upādhisaṃbhinnasyaiva nāḍyādau svāpe katipayasaṃnikṛṣṭārthajñānaprasaṅgāt suṣuptivyāghātaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:592: upādhilaye tvanyatra jīvasya sthityayogādbrahmaṇyeva svāpa āstheya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:593: evaṃ vikalpaṃ nirasya nāḍīpurītatorbrahmaṇā saha tulyavatsamuccayamaphalatvena dūṣayan guṇapradhānatvena samuccayamupasaṃharati-naca vayamityādinā //7//
GSP33brsgor3u:598: kiñca brahmaṇaḥ sakāśājjīvasyotthānaśruterbrahmaiva suṣuptisthānamityāha-sūtrakāraḥ-ataḥ prabodha iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:600: tasmādupādhilaye jīvasya brahmābhedādaupādhika eva bheda iti vivekadvākyārthābhedasiddhiriti sthitam //8//
GSP33brsgor3u:606: suṣuptau upādhināśāt karmānusmṛtyāderdarśanācca saṃśaye satyasmādbrahmaṇo jīvasyotthānaśruterbrahmaiva suṣuptisthānamityuktamayuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:607: suptādanyasyāpyutthānasaṃbhavena suṣuptasya nāḍyādisthānatvasaṃbhavādityākṣepasaṃgatyā niyamakābhāvādaniyama iti pūrvapakṣamāha-tasyāḥ punarityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:609: siddhānte tu ajñātabrahmātmanā sthitasyājñānabalena punastasyaivotthānāvaśyaṃbhāvādajñānanāśāya jñānāpekṣeti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:612_0: jñānaṃ vinā buddhyādyupādheratyantanāśābhāvādyayā buddhyopahito jīvaḥ suṣuptau kāraṇātmanā
GSP33brsgor3u:612_1: sthitastasyaiva nānākarmānubhavasaṃskāravatyopahita uttiṣṭhatīti siddhāntayati-sa eva tvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:617: pratiniyataṃ gamanaṃ yathā bhavati tathā pratiyonyāgacchati jāgaraṇāyeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:619: iha pūrvaprabodhe ye bhavanti ta eva tadottaraprabodhe bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:621: sa evottiṣṭhatīti niścīyate ityarthaḥ atraivotsūtraṃ yuktyantaramāha-apicetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:624: asmadādyaśakyamapi vivecanaṃ prāṇyadṛṣṭāpekṣa īśvaraḥ karotīti matvā dṛṣṭāntamāha-dṛśyate ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:626: abhede sa vānyo vottiṣṭhati iti cintānavakāśa ityāśaṅkya buddhibhedena jīvabhedāccintetyāha-evaṃ satīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:627: suṣuptau buddhināśena pratyahaṃ buddhyupādhibhedādekajīvasya vyavahāro na syādityata āha-sa evāyamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:636: pūrvapakṣe prasiddhāvasthātaḥ pṛthagātmano mūrcchāto vivekārthaṃ yatnāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:637: siddhānte pṛthagyatnadhrauvyamiti bhedaḥ pariśeṣaṃ darśayan siddhāntayati-na tāvadityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:639: aindriyakamarthajñānaṃ dehadhāraṇaṃ ca tasyāsti na mugdhasyeti vaiṣamyoktyā dūṣayati-netyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:646: uktasārūpyavairūpyābhyāmardhasaṃpattiḥ sarvaiḥ suṣuptidharmairasaṃpanno mugdhaḥ suṣupto na bhavati,
GSP33brsgor3u:647: sarvairmaraṇāvasthādharmairasaṃpattermṛto 'pi na kintu avasthāntaraṃ gata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:648: atra sūtre jīvasya brahmaṇārdhasaṃpattirukteti bhrāntaḥ śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:650: upādhyabhāvaśca mugdhasyāpi mama iti yatastasmāt kṛtsnasaṃpattirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:653: mugdhatvaṃ hi suṣuptasyārdhena niḥsaṃjñatvādidharmeṇa sāmyena saṃpannaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsgor3u:663: na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi / BBs_3,2.11 /
GSP33brsgor3u:664: sarvābhiravasthābhiraliptastvamartha iti nirūpayitukāmaḥ prathamaṃ tasya nirviśeṣatvamāha-na sthānato 'pi parasyobhyaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi /
GSP33brsgor3u:666: nirviśeṣatvaṃsav iśeṣatvaṃ cetyubhayaṃ liṅgyate jñāpyate yābhistā ubhayaliṅgaḥ śrutayaḥ saṃśayabījatvena santītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:667: yathā viruddhasuṣuptimaraṇobhayarūpaṃ mugdhatvaṃ tathā śrutiprāmāṇyādubhayarūpaṃ brahma dhyeyamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:670: uta svato nirguṇasya sarvagandhatvādiviśeṣa upādhitaḥ satyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:676: upādheḥ satyatve 'pi tatkṛtaṃ mithyeti dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇi tūpādhīnāṃ mithyātvāttatkṛto viśeṣo mithyeti kimu vācyamityāha-upādhīnāmiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:683: na bhedād iti cen na pratyekamatadvacanāt / BBs_3,2.12 /
GSP33brsgor3u:685: nirviśeṣatvaśrutāvapi viśeṣasyāpi śruterubhayarūpatvaṃ syāditi śaṅkāṃ vyācaṣṭe-athāpi syāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:688: kimupādhigata eva rūpabhedo brahmaṇyupacaryate dhyānārthamutopādhiyogātsatyaviruddharūpavattayā brahmaṇo bhedo bhavatīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:696: bhoktā jīvo bhogyaṃ śabdādi tayoḥ preritāramīśvaraṃ ca matvā vicārya me mama proktaṃ tatsarvaṃ trividhaṃ brahmaiveti jānīyādityarthaḥ //13//
GSP33brsgor3u:701: dvividhaśrutiṣu satīṣu nirviśeṣatve kiṃ niyāmakamiti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsgor3u:702: tatparātaparavirodhe tatparaṃ balavaditi nyāyo niyāmaka ityāha-arūpavadeveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:714: saṃprati satyaṃ nirviśeṣatvaṃ mithyā saviśeṣatvamityucyata ityubhayarūpatvāṅgīkāre 'pi na pūrvāparavirodha ityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:715: dvaitasya mithyātve jñānena bādhādupāsanādivyavahāro na syādityāśaṅkya bādhātprāgeva sa ityāha-satyamiti //15//
GSP33brsgor3u:720: yataḥ śrutiścinmātramāhātaśca viśeṣo mithyeti sūtrārthamāha-āha ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:726: kiñca śrutismṛtyoḥ paraniṣedhena brahmopadeśānniṣprapañcaṃ brahmetyāha-darśayati ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:727: atha dvaitoktyanantaraṃ jñānahetutvānneti neti upadeśaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:728: adhi anyat punaḥ punaradhīhi bho iti nirbandhakāriṇaṃ taṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca praśne tūṣṇībhāvaṃ tyaktvovāca /
GSP33brsgor3u:730: atastasya tūṣṇīṃbhāva evottaramiti sautraśca atośabdastathārthakaḥ ādimatkāryaṃ tanna bhavatītyanādimat /
GSP33brsgor3u:733: sarvabhūtaguṇairdivyagandhādibhiryuktaṃ māṃ mūrtimantaṃ paśyasīti yatsā māyā,
GSP33brsgor3u:734: ata eva sadvaito bhagavāniti māṃ draṣṭuṃ nārhasi vastuto dvaitātītatvādityarthaḥ //17//
GSP33brsgor3u:739: kiñca yathā jalādyupādhikalpitaḥ sūryacandrāderbhedacalanādirdharma evamātmana iti dṛṣṭāntaśruteśca nirviśeṣaṃ tattvamityāha-ata eva copameti /
GSP33brsgor3u:741_0: yathāyaṃ jyotirmayo vivasvānsvata eko 'pi ghaṭabhedena bhinnāḥ apo 'nugacchan bahudhā
GSP33brsgor3u:741_1: kriyate evamajo 'yamātmā devaḥ svaprakāśa eko 'pyupādhinā māyayā kṣetreṣvanugacchan
GSP33brsgor3u:747: ātmano nīrūpatvāddūrasthopādhyabhāvācca māyayā buddhyādiṣu pratibimbabhedo na yukta ityarthaḥ //19//
GSP33brsgor3u:753: dṛṣṭāntasāmye 'pi nīrūpātmanaḥ pratibimbaṃ svabuddhyā kathaṃ kalpyata ityata āha-na cedamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:768: dvipadaḥ puro manuṣyādidehāṃścakre catuṣpadaḥ puraḥ paśūnkṛtvā puraścakṣurādyabhivyakteḥ purastāt sa īśvaraḥ pakṣī liṅgaśarīrī bhūtvā pura uktāni śarīrāṇyāviśat,
GSP33brsgor3u:769: sa ca praviṣṭo 'pi puruṣaḥ pūrṇa evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:771: evaṃ pratibimbabhāvena bhedādeḥ kalpitatvāt nirviśeṣaṃ brahmeti svamatamupasaṃharati-tasmāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:774: tatra brahmaṇo niṣprapañcatve sthite kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ brahmeti saṃdehe prakāśavaccetyādidvitīyamadhikaraṇaṃ pravṛttaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:775: na sadrūpameva brahma kintu prakāśavacca cidrūpaṃ ca /
GSP33brsgor3u:777: satyaṃ jñānaṃ sadeva somyetyubhayaśruterdvirūpe brahmaṇyarthavattvāditi pūrvapakṣe siddhāntaḥ-āha ca tanmātram /
GSP33brsgor3u:782: uta bodharūpatvanirāsa āhosvitsattānirāsa iti vikalpya sarvathāpyānarthakyaṃ prapañcayannādye gatārthatāmāha-yadi tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:789: evaṃ siddhāntaṃ phalābhāvena dūṣayitvā pūrvapakṣaṃ dūṣayati-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:809: evaṃ sarve śabdā anākārabrahmaparā eveti tanmatamanūdya dūṣayati-yadapītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:812: asya jīvabhāvaṃ prāptasyeśvarasya daśa harayo viṣayā haraṇāddaśendriyāṇi prāṇibhedāpekṣayā śatāni sahasrāṇi ca teṣāmīśvarādbhedamāśaṅkyāha-ayamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:815: manomayādiśabdānāṃ mukhyavṛttyā guṇaparatvasaṃbhave niṣedhalakṣaṇāpi na yuktetyāha-śrutyā ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:816: kiṃ cākārānākāraśrutidvaividhye sati brahmanākāramevetyatra kiṃ vinigamakamiti śaṅkotthānādasthūlādiśrutīnāṃ nirākāratātparyaṃ niyāmakamiti kathanārthamidaṃ sūtramarthavadbhavati /
GSP33brsgor3u:817: sarvaśrutīnāṃ niṣedhārthatve tu śaṅkānutthānānniyāmakasūtraṃ vyarthaṃ syādityāha-sarveṣāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:818: nanūpāsanār'thakavākyānāṃ svārthe phalābhāvāt saphalaniṣedhavākyaśeṣatvamityāśaṅkya phalasya śrutatvānnānyaśeṣatetyāha-phalamapīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:825: nanu prapañcavilaye brahmalayaḥ syādabhedādityata āha-brahmasvabhāvo hi prapañca iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:826: kāraṇaṃ hi kāryasya svarūpamataḥ kāryanāśe 'pi kāraṇasya na layaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:828: prapañcasya satyasya kalpitasya vā laye vidhiriti vikalpyādyaṃ dūṣayati-tatra yadi tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:829: satyasya jñānādadhvasteḥ musalādinā ca kṛtsnadvaitadhvaṃsāyogāt nabhograsanavidhivadaśakyaviṣayo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:833: kiñca brahmajñānādau vidhiḥ kiṃ brahmaṇyajñāte jñāte vā /
GSP33brsgor3u:836: upadeśādeva jñāte brahmaṇi sākṣātkāradvaitabādhayoḥ siddhervidhivaiyarthyaṃ siddhasya vidhinā kartumayogādityāha-neti /
GSP33brsgor3u:841: tarhi jñāne vidhipratyayānāṃ kā gatirityata āha-draṣṭavyādiśabdā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:842: nanu śrutaṃ jñānaṃ tyaktvā tatsādhanavyāpāravidhiḥ kimiti kalpyata ityāśaṅkya jñānasya puruṣakṛtyasādhyatvādityāha-jñeyābhimukhasyāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:843: kiñca jñānavidhivādinā jñeyaṃ brahmāvaśyaṃ vedāntairjñāpanīyaṃ viṣayānavabodhe vidhibodhāyogāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:851: kṛtiṃ vinaiva cedbhrāntirevāto mānaṃ vinā vidhito jñānāsiddhermānavastutantre jñāne vidhirmṛṣetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:853: brahmātmaikyeniyoge ca vedāntavākyasya prāmāṇyamāśaṅkyārthabhedādvākyabhedo viruddhārthatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ ceti dūṣayati-athetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:854: kiñca śrutaṃ brahma na śruto vidhirvedānteṣu tatkalpane ca karmajanyatvānmokṣasyānityatvasātiśayatvādiprasaṅga ityāha-niyogaparatāyāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:857: bhinnakriyāvāciśabdaḥ śabdāntaraṃ yathā yajati dadātīti tathehāpi vedopāsīteti śabdabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:865: naca nirguṇavidyāniyoga eka eva saguṇavidyānaṅgīkārāditi vācyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:870: nirguṇavākyānāṃ tu paramārthālambanatvamityasmadukta eva vibhāgaḥ sādhīyānityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi //21//
GSP33brsgor3u:874: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ / BBs_3,2.22 /
GSP33brsgor3u:875: brahmaṇo nirviśeṣacinmātratvamuktvā sarvaniṣedhāvadhitvena sadrūpatvamāha-prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūya iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:876_1: sāraḥ 'karaṇātmā hiraṇyagarbho ya eṣa etasmin sūryamaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe
GSP33brsgor3u:879: tatra mahārajanaṃ haridrā tayā liptaṃ vastraṃ māhārajanaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:881: kecittu śrutimupalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā sūkṣmapañcabhūtānyamūrtāni pañcīkṛtāni mūrtāni tataścāmūrtarasatvoktyā karaṇānāṃ pāñcabhautikatvasiddhiriti vyācakṣate /
GSP33brsgor3u:883: ata uktāropasya niṣedhārthatvānneti netīti niṣedhenopadeśaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:892: niradhiṣṭhānaniṣedhādarśanātsarvaniṣedho na yukta ityarucyā prapañce brahmaniṣedha ityāha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:893: ekabrahmaṇa eva niṣedhe nakāradvayasya paunaruktyāmityata āha-abhyāsastviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:897: adhiṣṭhānānavaśeṣe tatpramārūpahetvabhāvāt niṣedhavākyārthaḥ pramā na syāt 'idamatra nāsti'iti loke niṣedhasya sādhiṣṭhānasyaiva pramitidarśanādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:900: adhiṣṭhānasattvaṃ vinā bhrāntiniṣedhayorayogācchūnyavādo na yukta ityuktvā pūrvavādinaḥ pakṣāntaraṃ dūṣayati-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:901: dehātmābhimānavallaukikamānaprāptadvaitasya niṣedho yukto na vedāntapramitabrahmaṇa iti bhāvaḥ yaduktaṃ vāṅmanasātītvāt niṣedhārhaṃ brahma iti tatrāha-vāṅmanaseti /
GSP33brsgor3u:902: brahmaṇo vāgādyatītatvaṃ niṣedhārthaṃ na cet kimarthaṃ taduktirityata āha-pratipādaneti /
GSP33brsgor3u:904: 'dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe'iti rūpadvayasyaiva prādhānyena prakṛtatvānnetīti niṣedha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:905: nanu 'ādityamaṇḍale puruṣa'iti brahmāpyatra prādhānyenoktamityāśaṅkya puruṣo liṅgātmā amūrtarasatvaśrutyā bhūtajanitatvabhānāt svapnarūpatvaśruteścetyāha-tajjanitameveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:906: rūparūpiṇorabheda uktaḥ nanu vāsanāmayaṃ rūpameva kimityupamīyate prasiddharūpameva kiṃ na syādityata āha-amūrtarasasyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:909: na cārthataḥ pradhānyadbrahmaṇo niṣedhaḥ rājño bhṛtyo nāstītyatra rājaniṣedhaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:910: kiñcaitra brahmaṇaḥ pratipādyatvāt na niṣedha ityāha-prapañcite ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:911: nanu brahmaṇi niṣiddhasyāpyanyatra sthitisaṃbhavāt kathaṃ kalpitatvamityata āha-tadāspadamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:915: sthāpitaṃ hi ārambhaṇādhikaraṇe pratyakṣādervyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na tatvāvedakamiti,
GSP33brsgor3u:921: yaccoktaṃ niṣedhābhyāṃ rūpaṃ rūpi brahma ca niṣidhyata iti,
GSP33brsgor3u:923: uddeśyavidheyārthānāṃ saṃkhyāsāmye yathākramaṃ saṃbandha iti nyāyaḥ 'yathāsaṅkhyamanudeśaḥ samānām'iti pāṇinisūtrasiddhastenātra rūpadvayoddeśena niṣedhadvayavidhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:925: mūrtaṃ nāmūrtaṃ netyevaṃ viśiṣyaniṣedhe jijñāsā na śāmyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:927: pratiṣedhānupapattyā brahmāstītyavagataṃ bhūyaḥ punaḥ paramastīti śrutiḥ sākṣādapi bravītītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:942: tarhi kadā grāhyamiti śaṅkottaraṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyāti-api cainamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:944: indriyairna gṛhyate api tu saṃrādhanena śāstrasaṃskṛtamanasetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:945: bhaktidhyānābhyāṃ pratyagātmanaścitte prakarṣeṇa nidhānaṃ sthāpanaṃ praṇidhānaṃ /
GSP33brsgor3u:950: sa hi teṣāṃ nāśo yadasadarthagrāhitayā sarjanaṃ tasmātteṣāṃ tayā sṛṣṭatvāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:952: kaścittu dhīro dhīmānāvṛttacakṣurniruddhendriyaḥ śuddhe cetasi pratyagātmanaṃ śāstreṇa paśyati mokṣārthītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:953: tataḥ karmaṇā viśuddhacitto jñānākhyasattvotkarṣeṇa saṃdhyāyaṃstaṃ niṣkalaṃ paśyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:961: yathā prakāśādaya upādhiṣu bhidyante na svataḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:962: evaṃ prakāśaścidātmāpi dhyānādikarmaṇyupādho bhidyate svatastasyāvaiśeṣyamekarasatvameva tattvamasītyabhyāsāditi sūtrayojanā //25//
GSP33brsgor3u:967: jīvasya brahmātmatvaphalaśrutirūpaliṅgādapi bheda aupādhika evetyāha sūtrakāraḥ-ato 'nanteneti //26//
GSP33brsgor3u:977: yadvā sūryaprakāśayorekatejastvadharmāvacchedena bhedābhedavajjīvaparayorapi ekenaivātmatvadharmeṇa bhedābhedau śrutibalātsvīkāryāviti sūtradvayārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:988: dharmabhedanaikadharmeṇa vā bhedābhedasvīkāre bhedasya satyatvādabhedavadanivṛttiḥ syāt ekatraiva bhedābhedasvīkāre loke virodhakathoccheda ityapi draṣṭavyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:989: tasmāt niṣprapañcaṃ cidekarasaṃ brahma tatpadalakṣyamastīti siddham // 29 // //30//
GSP33brsgor3u:995: yaduktaṃ neti netītyādiśrutibhiḥ brahmātiriktaṃ vastu niṣidhyata iti,
GSP33brsgor3u:998: yadyapi dyubhvādyadhikaraṇe setuśabdo vidhārakatvena gauṇo vyākhyātastathāpyunmānādiśrutīnāṃ gatimajānato 'yaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1000: sadvayaṃ brahmeti phalaṃ siddhānte tūktādvitīyatatpadalakṣyasiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1005: jāṅgalaṃ vātabhūyiṣṭhamiti vaidyokteḥ vātapracuro deśo jāṅgalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1010: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāṅmana ityāyatanavānnāma pāda iti catuṣpādbrahmeti pādānāmardhāni aṣṭau śaphā asyetyaṣṭāśaphaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1011: pādeṣu caturṣu pratyekaṃ catasraḥ kalā iti ṣoḍaśakalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1012: ṣoḍaśapaṇaparimitaṃ tāmraṃ kārṣāpaṇasaṃjñaṃ bhavati tadvatsadvayaṃ brahma,
GSP33brsgor3u:1026: nādyaḥ mānābhāvāt kāryasya brahmananyatvanirguṇayāccetyuktvā na dvitīyaḥ prāgutpatteradvayatvāvadhāraṇādityāha-naca brahmavyatiriktamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1033: vidhārakatvaṃ tu kalpitadvitīyāpekṣayāpi yujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1040: vākprāṇacakṣuḥśrotrāṇi manasaḥ pādā agnivāyvādityadiśa ākāśasya pādā dhyānārthaṃ kalpitāstadvadbrahmaṇa unmānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1042: pādakalpanāṃ vināpi vyavahāraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1043: kārṣāpaṇasya vyavahārāya pādakalpanāvat mandadhiyāṃ dhyānavyavahārāya brahmaṇa unmānakalpanetyarthaḥ //33//
GSP33brsgor3u:1049: sthānamupādhibuddhyādiḥ ekasyaivopādhinā bhinnasyopādhiśāntau satyāṃ saṃbandha upacaryate /
GSP33brsgor3u:1050: yathā saurālokāderaṅgulyādyupādhinā bhinnasyopādhiviyoge mahālokādyātmanā saṃbandhopacārastadvat tathāditya cakṣuṣoḥ sthānayorbhedāddhiraṇmayapuruṣabhedakalpanetyarthaḥ //34//
GSP33brsgor3u:1055: mukhyāveva saṃbandhabhedau kiṃ na syātamityatra sūtram-upapatteśceti //35//
GSP33brsgor3u:1060: svarūpeṇa brahmaṇā jīvasya saṃbandho bhedanivṛttirūpo yujyate na mukhyaḥ saṃyogādiḥ vastudvayāsattvāt tathā bhedo 'pi na svata ekatvaśruterityarthaḥ //36//
GSP33brsgor3u:1065: nanu dvitīyābhāve sarvagatatvaśrutivirodha ityata āha-anena sarvagatatvamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1066_2: iti bhāvaḥ adhiṣṭhānenādhyastaṃ jagadvyāptamadhyastatvāt rajjvā vyāptasarpavat, iti nyāyaḥ //37 //
GSP33brsgor3u:1072: nirviśeṣatvādanyaḥ svabhāvaḥ phalahetutvākhyaḥ iṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ devādīnāṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1075: saṃsāro janmamṛtipravāhaḥ gocaraḥ āśrayo yasya tatsaṃsāragocaram /
GSP33brsgor3u:1077: atra pūrvapakṣe phaladāturīśvarasya tatpadavācyasyāsiddherlakṣyāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1079_0: yadyapi sarvagatatvavatphaladātṛtvaṃ vyavahāradaśāyāṃ sidhyati yathāpi karmaṇa eva
GSP33brsgor3u:1083: yāgādikriyākhyaṃ karma tāvat kṣaṇikaṃ tatkiṃ svanāśāt phalaṃ janayatyuta phalamutpādya naśyati,
GSP33brsgor3u:1105: karmaṇo 'pūrvasya vā jaḍatvenopakaraṇamātratvātsvatantra īśvara eva phaladāteti siddhānto darśitaḥ //39//
GSP33brsgor3u:1112: tasya liṅarthasya preraṇātmano yāgo viṣayastadbhāvāvagamādyāgaḥ svargasādhanamiti gamyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:1114: apūrvadvārā karmaṇaḥ phalamupapadyata ityuktvā siddhāntaṃ dūṣayati-īśvarastviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1115: īśvaraḥ kiṃ karmānapekṣaḥ phalaṃ dadāti tatsāpekṣo vā,
GSP33brsgor3u:1117: dvitīye saṃveṣṭanasaṃskāramātrātkaṭādau veṣṭanavatkarmāpūrvādeva phalasiddheḥ kimīśvareṇeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1118: atra vayaṃ vadāmaḥ-candanakaṇḍakādidṛṣṭasaṃpattyaiva sukhādisaṃbhave kṛtaṃ dharmādharmābhyāmiti śrutismṛtibalāttadapekṣāyāmīśvareṇa kimaparāddham /
GSP33brsgor3u:1127: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsgor3u:1140: iha tatphalaṃ vākyārthajñānamānandādayaḥ pradhānasyeti sūtreṇāpunaruktāpekṣitatatpadadvācyārthopasaṃhāreṇa nirdhāryata iti phalaphalibhāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1141: saguṇavākyārthavidyācintā tu tadvidyānāṃ cittaikāgryadvārā nirguṇajñānasādhanatvātkriyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1144: vedyabhede vidyābhedacintā syāt brahmaṇastu vedyasyaikyānna cintāvasara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1148: pūrvapakṣe jñānabhedaśaṅkānupapattimuktvā codanādyabhedājjñānābheda iti siddhānto 'pyayukta ityāha-nāpyasyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1150: saguṇavidyāsveva bhedābhedacintā kriyate nirguṇavidyāyāṃ tvaikyaṃ siddhamiti vācyārtharūpaguṇopasaṃhāramātraṃ kriyate vākyārthanirṇayāyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1152: atra tu mithobhinnāstāḥ kiṃ pratiśākhaṃ bhidyānte na veti nāmādibhedāccodanādyaviśeṣācca saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1153: pūrvapakṣe vidyābhedādguṇānupasaṃhāraḥ siddhānte tvabhedādupasaṃhāra iti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1155_0: tatroktā hetavo nāmādayo vidyābhedārthamihocyante 'athaiṣa jyotirathaiṣa sarvajyotiretena
GSP33brsgor3u:1155_3: jyotiṣṭomātkarmāntaraṃ viśiṣṭadakṣiṇākaṃ vidhīyata iti nāmnaḥ karmabhedakatvamuktama /
GSP33brsgor3u:1159_0: 'tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam'ityatra vaiśvadevyāmikṣāyāge
GSP33brsgor3u:1162: tathā retonyūnā vāgādayaśchāndogye tatsahitā vājināmiti prāṇavidyābhedaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1163: kārīrivākyādhyayane taittirīyakāṇāṃ bhūmau bhojanaṃ dharmaviśeṣo nānyeṣāṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1166: naca tānyeva kārīryādīni karmāṇi dharmaviśeṣamapekṣante nāpekṣante ceti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1167: ato dharmaviśeṣācchākhāntare karmabhedaḥ śaṅkitastathātrāpi muṇḍakādhyayena keṣāñcideva śirasyaṅgārapātradhāraṇarūpaṃ vrataṃ nānyeṣāmiti vidyābhedaḥ syāt punaruktirabhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1168: yathā 'samidho yajati tanūnapātaṃ yajati'iti yajatyabhyāsātprayājānāṃ bheda uktastathā śākhāntare 'bhyāsādvidyābhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1173: ete nindāprayaścitte vedāntavidyāsu na vidyete iti nodāhriyete /

GSP33brsgor3u:2065: sa yaḥ kaścidadhikārī mahadvyāpakaṃ yakṣaṃ pūjyaṃ bhautikeṣu prathamajametatsacca tyacceti sattyaṃ brahma hiraṇyagarbhākhyaṃ vedopāste tasya lokajayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2068: madhyasthamakṣaramanṛtamubhayataḥ satyena saṃpuṭitatvātsattyaprāyameva bhavatīti nāmākṣaropāsanā satyavidyāṅgatvenoktā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2070: so 'sāvādityamaṇḍale 'kṣiṇi ca puruṣastasyāharityahamiti ca nāmadvayajñānātpāpakṣayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2075: tathātra phalaśrutibhedādvidyābheda iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-dve iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2081: evaṃ vidyābhede 'pyetadupāsyaikyajñānaṃ syādatra tūbhayathāsaṃbhave vidyaikyanānātvasaṃśaye satyamityupāsyarūpaikyajñānādvidyaikyaniścaya ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2084: kiñca yatra pradhānavidhāvevaṅkāma iti phalaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2086: iha tu prathamaja satyaṃ brahmeti vedeti pradhānavidyāvidhisthatvaṃ lokajayaphalasyābhyupetyāsmābhirnāmarūpāṅgasya phalaśruteḥ stutitvamuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2087_1: pradhāne tadaṅge vā yatkiñcitphalaṃ śrutaṃ tasya sarvasyāpi śrutatvāviśeṣājjāteṣṭiphalanyāyena
GSP33brsgor3u:2093: puruṣa udgītha ityevaṃ vidvānudgātā karmaphalasamṛddhisamartha iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2101_0: saguṇanirguṇavidyayoḥ śrutāḥ satyakāmādayo vaśitvādayaśca guṇā mitha upasaṃhartavyā
GSP33brsgor3u:2101_1: na vetyupasaṃhārasya phalabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃdehe satyavidyāyā ekatvādguṇasāṃkarye
GSP33brsgor3u:2104: bhinnāvidyāsthānāmapi guṇānāmāyatanādisāmyena nirguṇasthale buddhisthānāṃ stutyarthamupasaṃhāro yuktaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2107_0: yadyapi saguṇasthasatyakāmādiṣu nirguṇasthaguṇā antarbhūtā eva tathāpi nopasaṃhāroktervaiyarthyaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2117: nanu yadbhaktamiti yacchabdena bhojanākṣiptaṃ bhaktamanūdya yaddhomīyamiti homasaṃyogavidhinādākṣepakabhojanalope tadākṣiptabhaktāśritahomalopa iti siddhāntī śaṅkate-tadyaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2118: nirguṇasyopāstilope 'pi stutyarthaguṇasthairyavadbhojanalope 'pi prāṇāgnihotrasyādareṇa stutinirvāhārthamalopa iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣasūtreṇa pariharati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2122: ato bhaktavidherapavādārthatvādbhojanalope bhaktākhyaguṇasyāṅgasya lope 'pi na mukhyasyāgnihotrasya lopaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2125_0: ādhāne santi pavamāneṣṭyastatrāgnaye pavamānāya puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapediti
GSP33brsgor3u:2125_2: vihitāgnihotra havaṇyatideśena prāpta ādhānakāle cāgnihotrābhāvāttasyā guṇabhūtāyā
GSP33brsgor3u:2125_3: lope 'pi mukhyasya nirvāpasya na lopa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2135: āśritya vihitāhutīnāmāśrayalope lopa eva na dravyāntarākṣepakatvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2136: yathā kratuprayuktātpraṇayanāśritasya godohanasya kratulope lope na tvāśrayāntaraprayojakatvaṃ tatheti phalitamāha-tā itiyaduktamagnihotraśabdāddravyāntaraprāptiriti,
GSP33brsgor3u:2142: mukhyāgnihotrāṅgāni saṃpādyante cetkathaṃ tadanaṅgaṃ vediratra saṃpādyate tatrāha-vediśrutiśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2147: nanu svāmibhojanasyottarakālatvaṃ śrutyādivihitaṃ kathaṃ pūrvo 'tidhibhyo 'śnīyāditivacane bādhyate tatrāha-na hyastīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2157: yathānārābhyādhītaparṇamayītvaṃ juhūdvārā kratvaṅgatayā karmasu nityaṃ prayujyate,
GSP33brsgor3u:2159_1: prayujyate yathā vā paśvaṅgayūpāśrayaṃ bailvatvamannādyaphalatvādanityaṃ tathā karmasamṛdyādiphalakatvādupāsanānyanaṅgatvenānityānīti saṃśayārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2165: tathā cāṅgatayā prayogavidhinā nityena prayujyanta iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-yānītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2166: udgīthādayaḥ karmaṇāṃ guṇāḥ aṅgāni teṣāṃ yāthātmayaṃ rasatamatvādikaṃ tannirdhāraṇānyupāsanāni yāni tāni karmasu nityaparṇamayītvādivanna niyamyerannityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2167: eṣāṃ karmāṅgatve taddhīnasyāviduṣaḥ karma na syādaṅgalopāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:2170: tāṃ cedavidvānprastoṣyasi mūrdhā te vyapatiṣyatīti cākrāyaṇenartvijāmākṣiptatvādanupāsakānāmapi karmaprayogo 'stītyāha-prastāvādīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2172: tenomityakṣareṇa yaścaitadakṣaramevaṃ rasatamatvādirūpeṇa vedopāste yaśca na veda tāvubhau karma kuruta eva yadyapi tu vidyāvidyayornānātvaṃ bhinnaphalatvam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2173: dṛṣṭaṃ hi maṇivikraye jñānājñānābhyāṃ vaṇikśabarayoḥ phalavaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2174: tasmādyadeva karma vidyayodgīthādyupāstyā śraddhayāstikyabuddhyopaniṣadā rahasyadevatādhyānena karoti tadeva karma phalātiśayavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2175: karmaṇo vīryavattvaṃ nāma phalavattvaṃ vidyāhīnasyāpi gamyamānaṃ vidyāyā anaṅgatve liṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2177: asmai viduṣe kalpante bhogāya samarthā bhavanti bhūmerūrdhvā lokā āvṛttā adhastanāścetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2183: yadyapi parṇamayītvādīnāmaṅgatvabodhakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ nāsti tathāpi teṣu phalaśruteḥ stutitvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2186: yadapaḥ praṇayettat paśukāmasya sato godohanena brahmavarcasakāmasya kaṃsnyeti phalārthavidhireva nārthavādaḥ godohanādeḥ kratvanākāṅkṣitatvenāṅgatvābhāvāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:2188: tathā khādiratvena nirākāṅkṣakratvaṅgayūpamāśritya bailvamannādyakāmasya khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti phalārthavidhirevārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2189: parṇamayītvādiṣu phalavidhiḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-na tviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2192_1: vidheyaḥ paścānnirākāṅkṣajuhūmāśritya tasyaiva prakṛtidravyasya phalasaṃyogo vidheya
GSP33brsgor3u:2204: astu karmāṅgānāṃ tatsaṃbaddhopāstīnāṃ ca phalabhedānnityatvānityatvarūpaḥ prayogabhedaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2207: 'yataścodeti sūryastaṃ vada'iti praśne sūtrātmakavāyurvācyo vāyusthāne prāṇaṃ vadannekatvaṃ tayordarśayatītyāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2208: kiñca yadi vāyuprāṇayoḥ pṛthagdhyānaṃ syāttarhi dhyānāṅgavratabhedo 'pi syādiha tu prāṇāpānanirodhātmakavrataikyaśruterdhyānaikyamityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2210: kiñca vāyuprāṇo saṃvargau bhedenopakramya parastādvākyaśeṣe saṃvargadevaikyaśruteḥ prayogaikyamityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2212: caturaścatuḥ saṃkhyākānagnisūryodakacandrānaparāṃśca vākcakṣuḥśrotramanorūpāneko devaḥ kaḥ prajāpatiḥ jagāra gīrṇavānupasaṃhṛtavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2214_1: sāyaṃprātaḥkālabhedena prayogabhedastathā 'annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda'ityutpannāyāḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2215: 'tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau'ityupāsyabhedavākyasya prayogabhedaparatvādvākyādeva bhedasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2218: tato 'dhyātmādhidaivāvasthābhedenoktasya dhyeyabhedasya nirāse 'yataścodeti'iti ślokasya na śaktirityāha-śloketi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2221: nanvevakārādvāyuvratanivṛtteḥ prāṇa evaiko dhyeyo bhātītyata āha-ekameveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2222: vadanadarśanādīni vākcakṣurādīnāṃ vratāni śramarūpamṛtyunā bhagnānītyuktvā prāṇasyābhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2223: tathā jvalanatāpādīnyagnyādityādīnāṃ vratāni bhagnānītyuktvā vāyorabhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2224: 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ sthiravrata evametāsāṃ devanāṃ vāyurlocanti hyanyā devatā na vāyuḥsaiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyiḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2225: ato bhagnavatanirāsārtha evakāro na vāyuvratanivṛttyartha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2228: tena vratena vāyoḥ sāyujyaṃ samānadehatvaṃ salokatāṃ ca jayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2231: saṃprati pūrvoktaṃ pṛthagupadeśaṃ vivṛṇoti-tathā tau vā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2233: trayaḥ puroḍāśā asyāṃ santīti tripuroḍāśinīṣṭistasyāṃ kiṃ sahapradānamuta bhedeneti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-sarveṣāmiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2236: yadvā sarvadevārthaṃ yugapadavadānaṃ kāryamityatra heturacchaṃvaṭkāramiti avyarthatvāyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2237: ekārthamavatte haviṣi śeṣo yāgānarhatayā vṛthā syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2238: evaṃ sahāvadānaśruterdevaikyācca puroḍāśānāṃ sahaprakṣepe prāpte pṛthakprakṣepa iti siddhāntamāha-rājeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2240: kiñcādhvaryuṇā yajeti praiṣe kṛte hotrā yo mantraḥ paṭhyate sā yājyā,
GSP33brsgor3u:2242: tatrāsyāmiṣṭau prathamapuroḍāśapradāne yā kḷptā yājyā sa dvitīyapradāne puronuvākya,
GSP33brsgor3u:2250: karmotpattivākyasthadevatābhedaḥ karmabhede heturiha tvannādo bhavati ya evaṃ vedetyutpattāvekatvena jñātavidyāyāḥ paścācchrutavāyuprāṇabhedo na bhedakaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2259: utpatteḥ prāgidaṃ sarvaṃ naiva sadāsīnnāpyasadityupakramya manaḥ sṛṣṭimuktvā tanmana ātmānamaikṣatetīkṣaṇapūrvakamagnīnapaśyaditi mano 'dhikṛtya paṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2261: tābhiriṣṭakātvena kalpitābhirmanasaiva saṃpāditā agnayo manaścitasthānarkānpūjyānmanovṛttiṣusaṃpāditānātmanaḥ svasya saṃbandhitvena mano 'paśyat,
GSP33brsgor3u:2263_0: prāṇo ghrāṇaṃ karmendriyeṇa hastādinā citaḥ karmacitaḥ agnistvak pūrvatrāgnicayanaprakaraṇātkimete
GSP33brsgor3u:2266: iha tu manaścidādyagnīnāṃ prakaraṇātkarmāṅgatvenaikaprayogatvamiti prāpayya siddhāntamupakramate-tatretyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2267: pūrvapakṣe bhāvanāgnīnāṃ kratvaṅgatvamiṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ vikalpaḥ samuccayo vāstu /
GSP33brsgor3u:2269: tattatra sarvaprāṇimanovṛttibhirmama sadāgnayaḥ cīyanta iti dhyānadārḍhye sati sarvabhūtāni yatkiñcit manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmevāgnīnāṃ sā kṛtiḥ karaṇamityekaṃ liṅgaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2271: evaṃvide svapate jāgrate 'pi tadīyāgnīnbhūtāni sarvadā cinvantīti liṅgāntaraṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2279_0: pūrvasyeṣṭakābhiragniṃ cinuta ityuktasya sa eṣa tviṣṭakāgniriti saṃnihitasyāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2286: nanu akriyārūpāgnīnāṃ dhyānamayānāṃ kathaṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ tatrāha-mānasavaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2288: taddharmamāṇāmeva teṣvatideśāttasya madhyadaśarātrasya daśame 'hanyarthādekādaśe 'hani mānasagrahaḥ śrūyate-'anayā tvā pātreṇa samudraṃ rasayā prājāpatyaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhṇāti'iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2289: anayā rasayā pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudraṃ tvāṃ prajāpatidevatākaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhyate iti grahaḥ somarasaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2291: ata evartvijāṃ dhyāyitayā vividhavākyoccāraṇābhāvādavivākyasaṃjñā ahnaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2293: gṛhītasya svasthāne sthāpanamāsādanaṃ somasya homo havanaṃ hutaśeṣādānamāharaṇaṃ śeṣabhakṣaṇāyartvijāṃ mitho 'nujñānakaraṇamupahvānaṃ tato bhakṣaṇamityetāni mānasānyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2294: sa ca mānaso graho dvādaśāhādaharantaraṃ svatantramityāśaṅaḍkya dvādaśāhasaṃjñāvirodhānnāharantaraṃ kintu prakaraṇādavivākyasyāhno 'ṅgamiti siddhāntamāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2326: sarvadā sarvabhūtāni madarthamagnīn cinvantīti dhyāyedityapūrvārthatayā vidhikalpanāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:2334_0: saṃpadupāstyai manovṛttiṣu kriyāṅgānāṃ yojanamanubandhaḥ śrutyā kriyate tadanyathānupapattyāpyagnīnāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2335: te agnayaḥ, adhīyanta teṣāmādhānaṃ manasaiva kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2342: kiṃ bahūktyā yatkiñcidyajñe karmārādupakārakaṃ yajñiyaṃ yajñasvarūpotpādakaṃ ca tatsarvaṃ manomayaṃ kuryāditi śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2346: anādarārtho 'tideśo na bhavati kintu vikalpārtha ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2347: ekasminmādhye nirapekṣasādhanayorvikalpo bhavati yathā vrīhiyavayoratra tu kriyāgnerdhyānāgnīnāṃ sādhyabhedānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2353: artha iti śeṣaḥ manaścidādīnāṃ svātantraye kriyāprakaraṇādutkarṣaḥ syādityāśaṅkya sa iṣṭa ityāha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2354: ekādaśe cintitaṃ 'rājā svārājyakāmo rājasūyena yajeta'iti prakṛtyāveṣṭirnāma kācidiṣṭirāmnātā-'āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā',
GSP33brsgor3u:2358: śrūyate-'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutimāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ madhye nidadhyādyadi rājanyastadaindram'iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2360: tatrāgneyādicaruṣu aṅgānāṃ tantreṇa prayogo bhavati madhyenidhānaliṅgātprayogabhede madhye nidhānāyogādetayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayedityekavacanācca /
GSP33brsgor3u:2361: sa ca tantraprayogo rājasūyakratubāhyāyāmannādyakāmavarṇatrayakartṛkāyāmevāveṣṭau jñeyo na tu kratvantargatāyām /
GSP33brsgor3u:2362: nanu kimatra niyāmakaṃ kratvarthāyāmapyaveṣṭau tantraprayogaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cet / na /
GSP33brsgor3u:2364: varṇatrayasaṃyuktānāṃ kāmyāyāmevāṅgatantraikyasādhakasya madhye nadhānādiliṅgasya sattvādato liṅgaikavacanābhyāṃ tantraikye sati hiraṇyādikā militaikaivā dakṣiṇādheyā,
GSP33brsgor3u:2367: atra caikaprayogaliṅgasya kratvartheṣṭāvasaṃbhavaṃ kāmyeṣṭau ca saṃbhavaṃ vadatānena sūtreṇa kāmyeṣṭeḥ kratvartheṣṭivilakṣaṇatvātkratuprakaraṇādutkarṣa iti sūcitam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2376: kratvarthatvapuruṣārthatvavaiṣamye 'pi mānasatvasāmānyaṃ na virudhyate viṣamayorapi sāmyadarśanādityarthaḥ //51//
GSP33brsgor3u:2380: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ / BBs_3,3.52 /
GSP33brsgor3u:2381: kiñca pūrvottarabrāhmaṇayoḥ svatantravidyāvidhānāttanmadhyasthasyāpi brāhmaṇasya svatantravidyāvidhiparatvamityāha-pareṇa ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2382: cite 'gnau lokadṛṣṭividhānaṃ svatantramuttaratra gamyate pūrvatra maṇḍalapuruṣopāstistatsāṃnidhyānmadhye 'pi mānasāgnayaḥ svatantrā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2383: tarhi kriyāgninā saha pāṭhaḥ kimarthamityata āha-bhūyāṃsastviti //52//
GSP33brsgor3u:2388: manaścidādīnāṃ puruṣārthatvamuktaṃ tadayuktaṃ dehātiriktapuruṣābhāvādityākṣipati-eka ātmanaḥ śarīre bhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:2390: pūrvapakṣe tu paralokārthakarmasu mokṣārthavidyāyāṃ cāpravṛttiriti vyatirekamukhena phalamāha-na hyasatīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2391: vyatiriktātmavicārasya pūrvatantre kṛtatvātpaunaruktyamityāśaṅkya tatratyavicārasyāpīdameva sūtraṃ mūlaṃ jaiminisūtrābhāvādataḥ kva punaruktirityāha-nanu śāstretyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2392: 'yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ svargaṃ lokameti'ityādivākyasya bhokturabhāvādaprāmāṇyaprāptāvita evākṛṣya bhokturvicāraḥ kṛta ityatra vṛttikāravacanaṃ liṅgamāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2399: dehātirikta ātmāsti na veti vādivipratipatteḥ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-atraika iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2400_0: yadyapi samasteṣu militeṣu bhūteṣu caitanyaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ taptodakumbhasya jñānābhāvādvyasteṣu
GSP33brsgor3u:2400_1: tu nāstyeva tathāpi dehātmakabhūteṣu syāditi tebhyo bhūtebhyaścaitanyaṃ saṃbhāvayanto

GSP33brsgor3u:3130_1: brahmacāriṇaḥ prāyaścittapaśurgardabho laukikāgnau hotavya ityadhikāralakṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhādhyāye
GSP33brsgor3u:3130_2: nirṇītaṃ prāyaścittamādhikārikaṃ tadupakurvāṇasyaiva na naiṣṭhikasyeti prāpte siddhāntayati //41 //
GSP33brsgor3u:3134: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam / BBs_3,4.42 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3137: 'prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi'iti darśanābhāvasmṛteḥ prāyaścittābhāvāparatvaṃ kalpayitvā tanmūlaśrutikalpanātprāgeva kḷptasādhāraṇaśrutyā prāyaścittasadbhāvasiddheḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3139: prāyaścittasya bhāvābhāvasiddhyoḥ samatve 'pi bhāvaprasiddhiḥ śrutimūlatvādādartavyetyatra saṃmatimāha-taduktamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3141: ataḥ kasya caruḥ kārya iti saṃdehe vṛddhaprayogasāmyātsamā tulyā vikalpena pratipattiḥ syāditi prāpte siddhāntaḥ-śāstramūlā pratipattirgrāhyā śāstranimittatvāddharmādijñānasya /
GSP33brsgor3u:3145: brahmacaryarakṣārthaṃ yatnādhikyaṃ kāryamiti jñāpanārthaṃ prāyaścittaṃ spaṣṭamapi na paśyāmītyuktaṃ bhagavadatriṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3147: kṛcchraṃ prājāpatyaṃ mahākakṣaṃ bahutṛṇakāṣṭhadeśaṃ jaladānādinā vardhayeta /
GSP33brsgor3u:3162: bahis tūbhayathāpi smṛter ācārāc ca / BBs_3,4.43 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3164_0: kṛtaprāyaścittaistaiḥ saha kṛtaśravaṇādikaṃ jñānasādhanaṃ na veti saṃdehe teṣāṃ śuddhatvātsādhanamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:3164_1: prāpte prāyaścittātparaloke teṣāṃ śuddhatve 'pyatra śuddhabhāvānna sādhanamiti siddhāntayati-yadyūrdhveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3172_0: yaḥ kṛtaprāyaścittaḥ sa saṃvyavahārya ityutsargasya nindātiśayasmṛtyā naiṣṭhikādiṣu
GSP33brsgor3u:3172_1: bādhavadyo yadaṅgakartā sa tadāśritasya kartetyutsargasya kartuḥ phalaśrutyā bādha
GSP33brsgor3u:3173_0: atra kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayoraikādhikaraṇyaṃ phalaṃ siddhānte tvaṅgāśritā ṛtvikkartṛkā
GSP33brsgor3u:3173_1: apyupāstayo yajamānagāmisvatantraphalāḥ kimu vācyaṃ svaniṣṭhabrahmavidyāyāḥ svātantryamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:3174: ataḥ pādasaṃgatiḥ hiṅkāraprastāvodgīthapratihāranidhanākhyapañcaprakāre sāmni vṛṣṭidhyāturvarṣasamṛddhiḥ phalamiti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3175: śrutaṃ phalaṃ ṛtviggataṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-tacceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3177: astu tasya phalaṃ tadgataṃ kartātvanyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-phalaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3185: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate / BBs_3,4.45 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3188: tamudgīthākhyaṃ praṇavaṃ prāṇadṛṣṭyā dhyātavāndhyātvā ca naimiśīyānāṃ satriṇāmudgātāsīdityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3189: yajamānena svagāmiphalakasāṅgaprayogakaraṇāyartvijāṃ krītatvātkartṛtve 'pi na tatphalabhāktvamutsargasya bādhakābhāvādityuktatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:3190: krayaṇadvārā kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ copapadyate bhṛtyakartṛke yuddhe rājā yudhyate jayati cetivaditi bhāvaḥ // 45 // //46//
GSP33brsgor3u:3195: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat / BBs_3,4.47 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3197_0: yasmātpūrve brāhmaṇā ātmānaṃ viditvā saṃnyasya bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti tasmādadyatano
GSP33brsgor3u:3197_1: 'pi brāhmaṇa āpātajñānarūpapaṇḍāvānpaṇḍitastasya kṛtyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ śravaṇaṃ tannirvidya
GSP33brsgor3u:3197_2: niścayena labdhvā bālyena śravaṇajajñānasya balabhāvena mananenāsaṃbhāvanānirāsena
GSP33brsgor3u:3197_3: bālasya bhāvena vā śuddhacittatvena sthātumicchedevaṃ mananaśravaṇe kṛtvādānantaraṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:3197_4: munirnididhyāsanakṛtsyādevamamaunaṃ ca maunādanyadbālyapāṇḍityadvayaṃ maunaṃ ca nididhyāsanaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:3197_5: labdhvā atha jñānasāmagrīpauṣkalyānantaraṃ brahmāhamiti sākṣātkāravān brāhmaṇo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3198: maunaśabdasya siddharūpe pārivrājye anuṣṭheye ca dhyāne prayogātsaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3199: yathā taṃ ha baka ityādivākyaśeṣādudgīthādyupāsanasyārtvijyatvanirṇayastadvadatha brāhmaṇa iti vidhihīnavākyaśeṣānmaunasyāpyavidheyatvaniścaya iti pūrvapakṣamāha-na vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3201: yadi maunaṃ pārivrājyaṃ tadā vākyāntaraprāptamanūdyate bālyavidhipraśaṃsārtham /
GSP33brsgor3u:3207: kiñcāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyeti śravaṇamananavadanuṣṭheyatvoktermaunasya vidheyatetyāha-nirvedanīyatveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3212: sūkṣmārthasākṣātkārasādhanatvena dhyānādeḥ ṣaḍjādau lokataḥ prāptiṃ śaṅkitvā niyamavidhimāha-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:3213: nanu brahmavidyāpare vākye kathaṃ jñānāṅgamiti cetsaphalakratuparavākye 'ṅgavidhivadityāha-vidhyādivaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:3215: tatra pradhānaḥ kraturvidhyādirata evāṅgaṃ vidhyanta ityucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3222: samāvartanānantaraṃ kuṭumbe sthito brahmalokaṃ prāpnoti naca punarāvartata ityupasaṃhārātsaṃnyāso nāstīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3238: tatra bālye viṣaye taddhitasya bhāvārthatvāsaṃbhavātkarmārthatvaṃ gṛhītvā tiṣṭhanmūtratvādikarmaṇo 'prarūḍhendriyatvādirūpabhāvaśuddheśca bālakarmatvāviśeṣātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3239: pūrvapakṣe vidyāṅgatvena tiṣṭhanmūtratvāderapyanuṣṭhānaṃ siddhānte bhāvaśuddhereveti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3240: pūrvatra maunaśabdasya jñānātiśaye dhyāne prasiddhatvāt dhyānaṃ vidheyamityuktam,
GSP33brsgor3u:3243: yathopapādaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ mūtrādi yasya tadbhāvastattvaṃ bālyavidhibalātpātityaśāstramanyaviṣayamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3245: na sa tatpadamāpnoti saṃsāraṃ cādhigacchati'ityādi śaucabhikṣādiniyamavidhiśāstrāviruddhasya bhāvaśuddhākhyabālyasya vidhisaṃbhavānna yatheṣṭaceṣṭāvidhiriti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3252: aihikamapi saṃnyāsādibālyāntaṃ sādhanajātamuktvā tatsādhyavidyājanma vicāryata iti saṃgatiṃ vadan sādhanasya dvidhā phalasaṃbhavātsaṃśayamāha-sarvetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:3255: śuddhidvārā yajñādibhiḥ śravaṇādiṣu sākṣādvidyāhetuṣu ghaṭiteṣu vidyāvilambo na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3256: dṛśyate ca vilambaḥ ataḥ śravaṇādervidyāhetutvamasiddhamiti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3257: pratibandhakavaśādvilambe 'pi hetutvasiddhiriti siddhānte phalaṃ matvā citrādivadaniyataphalaṃ śravaṇādikamiti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3258: nanu prārabdhakarmaviśeṣeṇa śravaṇādiphalapratibandhaḥ kimiti kriyate śravaṇādinaiva karmavipākapratibandhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-upasthitavipākatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3265: tathāpi karmaṇaiva śravaṇādipratibandho na vaiparītyamityatra ko hetustamāha-sādhaneti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3277: asati prārabdhakarmapratibandhe śravaṇādinehaiva vidyodayaḥ yajñādibhiḥ saṃcitapāpapratibandhasya nirastatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:3278_0: sati tu bhogena tannirāsādamutreti vidyāyā aihikāmuṣmikatvaviśeṣaniyama uktastadvatphale
GSP33brsgor3u:3280: tasyāṃ vidyāvadviśeṣaniyamo 'sti na veti phalasyobhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-yatheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3284: kiñca śravaṇāditāratamyādvidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamaṅgīkṛtya vidyālabhyamuktau nātiśaya ityāha-apica vidyāsādhanamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3287: vidyayābhivyaktatvena brahmānanda eva mukhyaphalamabhivyaktiravidyānivṛttirānandasvarūpasphūrtipratibandhakābhāvatayā vidyayā sādhyate sā cānirvācyeti na dvaitāpattiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3297: kathaṃ tarhi pūrvādhikaraṇe vidyāyā viśeṣa uktaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:3299: satyāmapi sāmagryāṃ jñāne vilamba ukto na tāratamyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3300: tarhi satyapi jñāne muktau vilambaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-natviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3301: vāyvādipratibandhāddipotpattivilambe 'pyutpanne tamonivṛttivilambādarśanātsati jñāne nājñānanivṛttau vilamba iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3302: kiñca karmaṇāmupāsanānāṃ ca guṇabhedena tāratamyātphalatāratamyaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3307: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatkṛtau śārīrakavyākhyāyā bhāṣyaratnaprabhāṭīkāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
